entry.div:
For making gray
wood
One needs to take three
half-septiers
of
iron filings
, xviii
s
deniers'
-worth
of
glass alum
,
& as much
green copperas
, six
deniers'
-worth
of
verdigris
,
am
pitch
, & a
quart
of
cuyr
currier's
water
, and if you cannot find it, you will put
more
rainwater
of small degree.
